title: About Me
text:
My name is Reilly Richardson and I am a junior Biomedical Science major in the Medical Microbiology option at UNH.I am from Windham, NH. I am very interested in studying pathogenic microbes and I have really been enjoying getting to see how using R may be applicable to me in organizing and presenting data for the future.




Finish my bachelor’s degree
Apply to graduate programs in microbiology
Hopefully have a career in infectious disease research!




I love spending time with family, friends, and my dog!
Her name is Dottie!
Thanks for checking out my web site!

title: Projects and Involvement
text:
I don’t have a ton going on right now, but I have been shadowing in the Jeffers lab studying Toxoplasma gondii for the last few years, and I hope to start working on a senior thesis next semester! I am excited to get to work on a project of my own.
Some other things I do on campus are a capella and peer coaching for organic chemistry!
